thread.title: David Gauke on tax credit policy and Autumn Statement
thread.title_full: David Gauke on tax credit policy and Autumn Statement - BBC News

author: BBC
title: David Gauke on tax credit policy and Autumn Statement
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device David Gauke on tax credit policy and Autumn Statement 14 October 2015 Last updated at 15:05 BST
"No, that's a no", says Financial Secretary to the Treasury David Gauke, when Andrew Neil asks the Conservative MP if there is any chance of a government re-think in the Autumn Statement on changes to tax credits.
